about.title: About Us
about.description: At NewHorizons Immigrations Law, we specialize in helping people who want to live, work or invest abroad. Our main focus is on the United States, Europe and the United Arab Emirates.

footer.copyright: Â© 2026 New Horizons Immigration Law. All rights reserved.

hero.badge: Trust our experience and let us be your guide in the complex world of international migration.
hero.title: Get a Consultation for Your International Project
hero.description: Ready to take the next step towards your international project? Contact us today to schedule a consultation. We'll help you navigate the complexities of the immigration process and ensure a smooth and successful outcome.

about.title: Programs We Offer
about.description: We work with permanent residence projects and visas based on professional career, merits or investment. More than 16,000 people accompanied with 91% success rate.

eb1.title: EB-1
eb1.description: For people with outstanding career in sciences, arts, education, business or sports. Permanent residence based on exceptional merits and international recognition. No job offer required and has priority processing available.

eb2.title: EB-2 NIW
eb2.description: For professionals whose work generates national benefit or significant impact. Job offer exemption required, ideal for researchers, academics and outstanding professionals. Requires demonstrating that the applicant provides substantial benefit to the United States.

eb5.title: EB-5
eb5.description: Investment programs with permanent residence possibility for investors and their families. Different investment levels available according to project and location. Requires creating at least 10 jobs in the United States through the investment made.

countries.title: Popular Countries to Live In
countries.description: Discover our most loved countries to live in, carefully curated for international inmigrants.
